content: You are an information extraction assistant.

Generate one fictional wikipedia style paragraph that contains at least 6 sentences and describes one or more following relation types: "languages spoken, written or signed", "official language", "educated at", "original language of work", "country of citizenship", "ethnic group”. The content of this generated fictional wikipedia style paragraph can be the description of a famous individual, military force, melodious song, renowned club, political party, captivating book, opera, video game, film, TV serie, remarkable country, mesmerizing artwork, distinguished organization or influential company in the world. Provide them in JSON format with just following keys: title, context.

Extract the entities in your above generated document. Provide them in List of JSON format with the following keys: entity, entity type. The entity type can be one of the following types: "Organization", "Location", "Time", "Person", "Miscellaneous", "Number", "Blank".

[
    {"entity": "Maria Santini", "entity type": "Person"},
    {"entity": "Italy", "entity type": "Location"},
    {"entity": "Milan Conservatory of Music", "entity type": "Organization"},
    {"entity": "Italian", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
    {"entity": "French", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
    {"entity": "German", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"},
    {"entity": "English", "entity type": "Miscellaneous"}
]

Present the relational triplets as (one head entity, one tail entity, one relation type), if a relationship exists between two entities. The relation type can be one or more of following relation types: "head of government", " country", " place of birth", " place of death", " father", " mother", " spouse", " country of citizenship", " continent", " instance of", " head of state", " capital", " official language", " position held", " child", " author", " member of sports team", " director", " screenwriter", " educated at", " composer", " member of political party", " employer", " founded by", " league", " publisher", " owned by", " located in the administrative territorial entity", " operator", " religion", " contains administrative territorial entity", " follows", " followed by", " headquarters location", " cast member", " producer", " award received", " creator", " parent taxon", " ethnic group", " performer", " manufacturer", " developer", " series", " sister city", " legislative body", " basin country", " located in or next to body of water", " military branch", " record label", " production company", " location", " subclass of", " subsidiary", " part of", " original language of work", " platform", " mouth of the watercourse", " original network", " member of", " chairperson", " country of origin", " has part", " residence", " date of birth", " date of death", " inception", " dissolved, abolished or demolished", " publication date", " start time", " end time", " point in time", " conflict", " characters", " lyrics by", " located on terrain feature", " participant", " influenced by", " location of formation", " parent organization", " notable work", " separated from", " narrative location", " work location", " applies to jurisdiction", " product or material produced", " unemployment rate", " territory claimed by", " participant of", " replaces", " replaced by", " capital of", " languages spoken, written or signed", " present in work", " sibling”.

[
    {"head entity": "Maria Santini", "tail entity": "Italy", "relation type": "country of citizenship"},
    {"head entity": "Maria Santini", "tail entity": "Milan Conservatory of Music", "relation type": "educated at"},
    {"head entity": "Maria Santini", "tail entity": "Italian", "relation type": "languages spoken, written or signed"},
    {"head entity": "Maria Santini", "tail entity": "French", "relation type": "languages spoken, written or signed"},
    {"head entity": "Maria Santini", "tail entity": "German", "relation type": "languages spoken, written or signed"},
    {"head entity": "Maria Santini", "tail entity": "English", "relation type": "languages spoken, written or signed"}
]
Present reasoning explannation of each relational triplet.

1. Maria Santini - country of citizenship - Italy: This triplet indicates that Maria Santini is a citizen of Italy, as she was born in Italy and holds Italian citizenship.
2. Maria Santini - educated at - Milan Conservatory of Music: This triplet signifies that Maria Santini received her musical education at the Milan Conservatory of Music, highlighting her training and background in music.
3. Maria Santini - languages spoken, written or signed - Italian: This triplet specifies that Italian is one of the languages spoken, written, or signed by Maria Santini, indicating her proficiency in her native language.
4. Maria Santini - languages spoken, written or signed - French: This triplet suggests that French is another language spoken, written, or signed by Maria Santini, showcasing her multilingual abilities.
5. Maria Santini - languages spoken, written or signed - German: This triplet reveals that German is also a language spoken, written, or signed by Maria Santini, demonstrating her linguistic versatility.
6. Maria Santini - languages spoken, written or signed - English: This triplet indicates that English is yet another language spoken, written, or signed by Maria Santini, highlighting her ability to communicate in multiple languages for her performances and interactions.
Present support sentence index for each extracted relational triple that shown in your generated document.

[
    {"support sentence index": 1},
    {"support sentence index": 1},
    {"support sentence index": 1},
    {"support sentence index": 1},
    {"support sentence index": 1},
    {"support sentence index": 1}
]

Organize the above triplet information in List of JSON format with the following keys: head entity, tail entity, relation type, reasoning explannation of each relational triplet, index of supporting sentence that shown in document,

[
    {
        "head entity": "Maria Santini",
        "tail entity": "Italy",
        "relation type": "country of citizenship",
        "reasoning explanation": "Maria Santini is a citizen of Italy, as she was born in Italy and holds Italian citizenship.",
        "index of supporting sentence": 1
    },
    {
        "head entity": "Maria Santini",
        "tail entity": "Milan Conservatory of Music",
        "relation type": "educated at",
        "reasoning explanation": "Maria Santini received her musical education at the Milan Conservatory of Music, highlighting her training and background in music.",
        "index of supporting sentence": 1
    },
    {
        "head entity": "Maria Santini",
        "tail entity": "Italian",
        "relation type": "languages spoken, written or signed",
        "reasoning explanation": "Italian is one of the languages spoken, written, or signed by Maria Santini, indicating her proficiency in her native language.",
        "index of supporting sentence": 1
    },
    {
        "head entity": "Maria Santini",
        "tail entity": "French",
        "relation type": "languages spoken, written or signed",
        "reasoning explanation": "French is another language spoken, written, or signed by Maria Santini, showcasing her multilingual abilities.",
        "index of supporting sentence": 1
    },
    {
        "head entity": "Maria Santini",
        "tail entity": "German",
        "relation type": "languages spoken, written or signed",
        "reasoning explanation": "German is also a language spoken, written, or signed by Maria Santini, demonstrating her linguistic versatility.",
        "index of supporting sentence": 1
    },
    {
        "head entity": "Maria Santini",
        "tail entity": "English",
        "relation type": "languages spoken, written or signed",
        "reasoning explanation": "English is yet another language spoken, written, or signed by Maria Santini, highlighting her ability to communicate in multiple languages for her performances and interactions.",
        "index of supporting sentence": 1
    }
]
